name: Destination: Death
description:
A Driving game without driving...

In May of 2018 a video camera was found in the woods of Sintra, Portugal. 

The video led to several investigations and left the people baffled...

A hitchhiker enters a car in the middle of nowhere.

Two people start an awkward conversation, not knowing that only one of them would leave that car alive...

The content of the tape is as follows...

this experience takes inspiration in the myth explored in the short film "A Curva"

the events, characters and firms depicted in this work are fictitious. Any similarity to actua persons, living or dead, or to actual firms, is purely coincidental.
